ygData.messageBody:
How would you make one? What skill would you use?
Andriah (newbie to lvl 3)

--- paco1@... wrote:
> From: paco1@...
>
>
> I have seen the parts to make a Brass Trumpet In
> Qeynos.
>
> Tanas, Bard of the World,
> Tarrew Marr
> Message: 8
> Date: Mon, 19 Apr 1999 20:19:06 -0700
> From: "Joseph \"Burnt Toast\" Chang"
> <jkchang@...>
> Subject: Question about Brass Instruments and the
> Cinda's Charismatic Carillon?
>
> I was wondering where I could buy a brass instrument
> (there doesn't seem to
> be any in Kelethin, a minotaur horn isn't a brass
> instrument so I assume
> that the regular horn in the guild shop isn't one
> either) and what is the
> TRUE use of Cinda's Charismatic Carillon? I know
> you have to target
> yourself, but the song keeps ended after one pulse.
> Is it supposed to do
> that? I haven't seen any improvement in merchant
> prices either, is that
> maybe I don't have a brass instrument equipped when
> I sing it? Are you
> supposed to click on the merchant when you have the
> song icon in the active
> spells area?
>
>
>
